name: 5Shot - Style
description:
What's this LoRA

This is a LoRA trained on a single image, increasing the weight tend to make change the style and adding an armor to the subject. This is part of my "shot" series of lightweight LoRAs trained on single images. You need to lower the weight, otherwise all the images will look similar (check the comparison picture).

All the images in the examples have been created using my custom model (https://civitai.com/models/24149) and this LoRA only. All the examples have been created using the hires-fix or by creating the base 512x768 image, upscaling it to 1.5 and the applying the same prompt again as img2img

All the pictures have been created using a weight between 0.6-1.0.

The LoRA works also on NSFW (check last examples).

Training Picture

This is the picture on which the LoRA is trained (also AI generated):

Guides

Learn how to create pictures like mine with my step-by-step tutorials:

  • Beginner's Guide

  • Prompting

  • My Workflow

  • Inpainting

Support

If you want to support my work, you can check out my music here:

https://inzaniak.bandcamp.com/

You can also check my AI Art accounts, where you'll find daily pictures made with my models (and previews of new ones coming):

  • Instagram

  • DeviantArt
